page.title: 19FASHION
page.content: Fashions change every 7-12 months. The fashions at the moment are wearing tracksuit bottoms with luminous socks. The fashion in shoes is black trainers. The main colours in 1985 are luminous red, yellow, green etc. Earrings at the moment are in many different colours with gold or glitter on them. The gold is usually artificial. Diamante earrings are also in fashion. There are suits for girls which are leggings and the top all in one. These are called 'Flying Suits'. The main colours are pastel colours.
